    DefaultCommandServiceBuilder allowMention()

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultCommandServiceBuilder

      public DefaultCommandServiceBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultPrefix

      public DefaultCommandServiceBuilder setDefaultPrefix​(java.lang.String prefix)
      Set the default prefix. This prefix is used when:
      • customPrefix is not set.
      • a message is received in the direct messages of the bot.
      Parameters:
      prefix - The prefix you need to type in before every command.
      Returns:
      Returns DefaultCommandServiceBuilder.

    • setVariablePrefix

      public DefaultCommandServiceBuilder setVariablePrefix​(java.util.function.Function<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild,​java.lang.String> prefix)
      Use this method to make guild specific prefixes. The defaultPrefix will be replaced with the default prefix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - A Function, which returns a guild specific prefix.
      Returns:
      Returns DefaultCommandServiceBuilder.

    • allowMention

      public DefaultCommandServiceBuilder allowMention()
      This method allows the bot to respond not only on commands, the bot will then also respond at his mention.
      Returns:
      Returns DefaultCommandServiceBuilder.

    • build

      public DefaultCommandService build()
      Build the command service.
      Returns:
      Returns a finished DefaultCommandService.
